text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ah, you're here again. Hello～.
I had spent the past few days watching Hishi Miracle training…… I was trying to figure out what it was that made me curious about her.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Today's focus is on step placement～. Make sure you help me with studying again when it's over～.

text_block_list.name: Cheerful Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Huh, that trainer is here again! Heeey～!

text_block_list.name: Cynical Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Aren't they showing up pretty often? Does this mean you're going to debut, Mira-ko?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Heh…… what're you gonna do～? What if I actually have amazing talent, and I'm on my way to becoming a Triple Crown Uma Musume……?

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: No way, no way.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: So mean～!
Hishi Miracle was the same as usual, running leisurely together with her friends. However――

text_block_list.name: Cheerful Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Hmmm～…… we're going to pick up the pace now, what do you wanna do Mira-ko?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ahh～……take it easy, the same as usual～. My engine isn't really warmed up just yet～.

text_block_list.name: Cynical Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Got it. Make sure you finish in time though, or else the instructor is gonna scold you.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Aha. Yeah～
Hishi Miracle was left behind. However―― right around the time when the other Uma Musume were crossing the goal――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Huu, huu, huu……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Huu…… finally I'm starting to get warmed up. All～right!
As I expected, Hishi Miracle started to surge forward. The other Uma Musume weren't nearby so they wouldn't have noticed at all.

text_block_list.name: Cheerful Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Ahhh～ I'm tired! Let's take it easy with the stretches～.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: After this we still have to do weight training, it's gonna be rough～…… By the way, do you have the English print out from last week?

text_block_list.name: Cynical Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: I've got it but……did you do something with yours again? The teacher said those would be questions on the test.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Weeeell～…… that teacher's print outs are really thin so I get them mixed up with other things and end up throwing them away～……
She took it easy while stretching and talking to her friends. After that, they took it easy on the weight training too.
After that, they did some more light stretches. After school training should have been over at that point, but……
On the grounds in the evening, when the number of people was lowest, Hishi Miracle was still continuing her training.
It was slow-paced, and also fairly basic. However, if you looked closely――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……Alright. Then, next is……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Howaah!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: You scared me. So it's just Trainer-san～, huh……? Staying out here so late, is something wrong?
There were a lot of things I wanted to say. I wanted to have at least one proper conversation, so I called out to her.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Geh, are you here to scold me? I know it kinda looks like I've been slacking but……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……Huh?
As an example, the weight training they just did―― while the pace may have been slow, they were still gradually increasing the weight used.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, we never finish in time though～. So I figured we should at least increase the load～.
Considering their previous run, today's condition, and her words just now about 『Not finishing in time』. I was convinced.
This Uma Musume named Hishi Miracle―― she had amazing potential, it just took longer for her to warm up……the 『Slow Start』 type!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Eh～? Ehehe, to think you'd praise me like that～……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: It kinda increases my motiviation just a little bit. It'd be nice if that was enough for me to win though――
It's true that her engine was slow to start. Without doing something about that, she wouldn't be able to catch up. However――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: I can win…… So I can win, huh? Fufu, even something so simple makes me happy～.
Maybe that was that 『Something』 that caught my attention that day. As long as you can realize her potential, she can surely bloom.
She seemed happy with just this so far. With just a push, maybe this could be applied to her training……!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, thank you very much. Because of that, I feel a little bit better――
choice_data_list: Leave it to me, I'll make you win!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……Huh? 『Make me win』?
choice_data_list: I want to form a contract!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: W-when did this conversation become so serious!? Suddenly saying something like that, it doesn't feel realistic～!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Expectations……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……Expectations, huh～……? I see. Hmmmmm～, in that case……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ah, but! At the very least make it, 『If I win』! A contract if I win the next Selection Race――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: If I don't win…… we can pretend this conversation never happened. ……Then, I'll be leaving!
Hishi Miracle told me her conditions for the contract. Is she gauging my ability as a trainer?
Or is there some other reason―― during this upcoming training, I'd have to learn more about her.
